item.title: Try Hack Me Intermediate Nmap
item.description: OverView Follow @anir0y Intermediate Nmap {FREE ROOM} Task 01: You’ve learned some great nmap skills! Now can you combine that with other skills with netcat and protocols, to log in to this machine and find the flag? This VM MACHINE_IP is listening on a high port, and if you connect to it it may give you some information you can use to connect to a lower port commonly used for remote access!
